title: House of Cards
describtion: This series is very cool, dramatic and shit...

title: Game of Thrones
describtion: Medieval ballad with lots of blood and sex
from the pencil of the great (aka fat) bestseller-writer George RR Martin.

title: Supernatural
describtion: As the name said, supernatural events happening around the globe
young brothers Dean and Sam are on their way to solve them.

title: NCIS
describtion: Spec ops from NY city, loaded guns, bloodrush, nothing else to say about it.

title: The Wire
describtion: Story about undercover cops and drug dealing. The dealers are minorities from Detroit,
not a single chance to get bored during this action-packed drama.

title: Grimm
describtion: Remember when you got spooked by your parents who read bedtime stories about
Red Riding Hood, the Wolf and the grandma? Prepare to feel the same while you watching this series with handsome actors and
